template.name: lpd_per_role_template
template.summary: The per role template for the lpd module.

desc.p: This template creates a derived domains which are used for lpr printing client.
This template is invoked automatically for each user, and generally does not need to be invoked directly by policy writers.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

param.name: user_domain
param.summary: The type of the user domain.

param.name: user_role
param.summary: The role associated with the user domain.

template.name: lpr_admin_template
template.summary: The administrative functions template for the lpd module.

desc.p: This template creates rules for administrating the ldp service, allowing the specified user to manage lpr files.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

interface.name: lpd_domtrans_checkpc
interface.summary: Execute lpd in the lpd domain.

interface.name: lpd_run_checkpc
interface.summary: Execute amrecover in the lpd domain, and allow the specified role the lpd domain.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the lpd domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the lpd domain to use.

interface.name: lpd_list_spool
interface.summary: List the contents of the printer spool directories.

interface.name: lpd_manage_spool
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete printer spool files.

interface.name: lpd_relabel_spool
interface.summary: Relabel from and to the spool files.

interface.name: lpd_read_config
interface.summary: List the contents of the printer spool directories.

template.name: lpd_domtrans_user_lpr
template.summary: Transition to a user lpr domain.

desc.p: Transition to a user lpr domain.
This is a templated interface, and should only be called from a per-userdomain template.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

desc.p: Use lpd server instead of cups
